nanobanana_prompt.prompt: Scene archetype: Premium product studio close-up. Composition: single Bee Venom Bswell glass jar centered-left in threeâ€‘quarter angle, product occupying central 60% of canvas; background: soft warm studio bokeh, gentle gradation from warm top-left to cooler bottom-right. Lighting: soft, directional warm key light from top-left, subtle rim light to emphasize glass edge, high clarity on product, background blur heavy (bokeh) to ensure product is the sharpest element. Overlay placements (explicit anchors and percents): 1) Primary headline overlay anchored top_left at x=12%, y=12%, max_width=76%, max_height=18%; 2) Badge group anchored top_right at x=88%, y=14%, max_width=30%, max_height=12% containing two stacked badges; 3) Subheadline anchored bottom_left at x=12%, y=82%, max_width=76%, max_height=12%. Typography rules: bold sans serif (e.g., Montserrat/Inter), headlines weight 700, subheadline weight 600, all text white with strong dark stroke (2â€“4px) or 30% black shadow for legibility; rounded pill badges with white fill and subtle dark stroke. Product treatment: use provided cutout, slight shadow and reflection on surface; DO NOT change product label or create new markings. Composition rules: maintain consistent visual system across cards (warm soft studio light, shallow depth of field, rounded badge style), but vary framing per card. Make sure product is the absolute sharpest element; apply lens bokeh to background. Negative constraints: no faces, no people, no hands, no tattoos, no logos, no watermarks, no extra text beyond specified overlays, do not alter product model or label, no staged clinical equipment. Deliver layered output with separate alpha for product and text overlays.

composition_rules.focus: Product-centric: jar is the sharpest, occupies central column. Background intentionally blurred with bokeh to create depth.
composition_rules.hierarchy: Headline (top-left) > Badges (top-right) > Subheadline (bottom-left) > Product visual dominance.
composition_rules.text_safe_zone: Reserve 10% margins on all sides (top/bottom/left/right). Place all overlays inside the central 80% area; avoid placing text within the outer 10% band.
composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: Never place or composite the product image over the defined text_safe_zone. The product must not overlap any overlay area; keep product within central 60â€“70% vertical strip, avoiding top 12% and bottom 12% overlay zones.

nanobanana_prompt.negative_prompt: no other product models, do not generate different jar or label, no faces, no people, no hands touching product, no logos, no watermarks, no extra text beyond specified overlays, no medical devices, no clinical scenes, no brand duplicates

cards.goal: Explicar el mecanismo clave (microâ€‘estimulaciÃ³n/peptidos/hialurÃ³nico) con una metÃ¡fora visual y enmarcar el resultado deseado: mÃ¡s firmeza y textura mejorada. Suavizar objeciones con recomendaciÃ³n de prueba de parche para alÃ©rgicos.
